channel.title: Help portforwarding
channel.description:
Basically i need help portforwarding my router is a Ping Communication RGW208EN, tried alot of things and watched most guides, they all say the same basically my problem is [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/29vys1v.png[/img]
If you know how to help me please please please add me on skype i really need this!
Skype: Gmaulcombo

item.title: Help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Would be great if you could move the message box so we can see your input. But to me it looks like you need to define your local ip name . Try to go to portforward.com theyâ€™re tutorials work. you may counter into some ads, dont click them you will end up downloading pointless stuff. When portforwarding you dont need any software.

Read full topic

item.title: Help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Not_Botting Not Botting
item.description:
@Not_Botting wrote:

Alot of people seem to have problems portforwarding through their routers. Try uTorrent or just buy a VPS/ Dedi.
